    Amulya Uppala, Truong Pham, Jewel Lim

    • Method Detail

      • startPeers

        public boolean startPeers()
        Finds the perfect subset of peers to get the entire file with the rarest first preferred.
        Returns:
        returns true if entrireBitField has been found from peers, false if not

      • makeList

        public void makeList(java.util.List<Peer> subset,
                     bitFieldDS[] bfDS)
        Makes a subset list based on the rarest pieces first.
        Parameters:
        pci - peer connections info that holds the peers and their info
        subset - list of peers needed for download
        bfDS - number of peers that have each chunk at that index

      • randomUnchoke

        public static void randomUnchoke()
        This method implements the optimistic unchoke functionality. When the 30 second timer is up, it chooses the unchoked peer with the worst throughput, unchokes it, and randomly picks a choked peer as the optimistic choke.

      • makeThreads

        public void makeThreads()
        For every peer in the list of peers we want to connect to, send an interested message stop the keep alive messages and start the thread.

      • extractPeers

        public boolean extractPeers(java.util.ArrayList list)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the list of peers and verifies the ones we need to open the connection and get hte bitfield the list is from the tracker.
        Parameters:
        List - list of all peers retieved from tracker
        Returns:
        true if desired peerIp is found, false if not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getTrackerInterval

        public int getTrackerInterval(java.util.HashMap response)
        Gets the minimum time interval to update tracker at.
        Parameters:
        reponse - the reponse of the tracker
        Returns:
        returns tracker interval

      • closeAllConnections

        public void closeAllConnections()
        closes all connections to the peers.
